cohort.description: While the federated corporations are left to police most situations, this Vorsiber division can override them as needed.

To ensure soldier loyalty, troop rotations are handled by this division of Vorsiber. The federated corporations maintain off-books paramilitary forces. Vorsiber, whose numbers are in the millions, tolerates these relatively insignificant forces.
Scientists and engineers disguising their location to work with forbidden technologies, including nanotech and genetics.
The top legal body in the city and the bureaucratic coordinator of the federated corporations.
Humans have been trying to create Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) for centuries, and have met with constant failure. The fact that you exist as an independent AGI is a surprise to everyone.
Division working with cryogenic methods to extend human lifespan.
The VSA operates one of Earth's three spaceports. Earth is under blockade by the Space Nations, but they permit surveilled spaceports in the three wealthiest cities.
Vorsiber Atomic, armed with nuclear strike capability, came to prominence during World War III.
Citizens who gain special favor can buy into this subsidiary. The benefits pass to heirs.
Specialist arm of SecForce investigates and shuts down unlicensed nanotech.

Noncommissioned Officers, or NCOs, are the backbone of the military. Senior NCOs have an immense amount of practical experience and skill. NCOs are promoted through the enlisted ranks, rather than going to a military academy.
